    • Method Detail

      • getHottestCollections

        public static void getHottestCollections(java.lang.String networkId,
                         java.lang.String siteId,
                         java.lang.String tag,
                         java.lang.Integer requestResults,
                         com.loopj.android.http.JsonHttpResponseHandler handler)
                                  throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Performs a network request on a different thread and delivers a message to the callback. A JSON object with the results will be bound to the message.
        Parameters:
        networkId - The network to query against as identified by domain, i.e. livefyre.com.
        siteId - Site ID to filter on. Optional.
        tag - Tag to filter on. Optional.
        requestResults - Number of results to be returned. The default is 10 and the maximum is 100. Optional.
        handler - Implement "handleMessage" for this callback.
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException
        See Also:
        "https://github.com/Livefyre/livefyre-docs/wiki/Hottest-Collection-API"

      • generateHottestCollectionsEndpoint

        public static java.lang.String generateHottestCollectionsEndpoint(java.lang.String networkId,
                                                  java.lang.String siteId,
                                                  java.lang.String tag,
                                                  java.lang.Integer requestResults)
                                                           throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Generates a user content endpoint with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        networkId - The network to query against as identified by domain, i.e. livefyre.com.
        siteId - Site ID to filter on. Optional.
        tag - Tag to filter on. Optional.
        requestResults - Number of results to be returned. The default is 10 and the maximum is 100. Optional.
        Returns:
        Trending Collections endpoint with the specified parameters.
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException

      • getUserContent

        public static void getUserContent(java.lang.String networkId,
                  java.lang.String userId,
                  java.lang.String userToken,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> statuses,
                  java.lang.Integer offset,
                  com.loopj.android.http.JsonHttpResponseHandler handler)
                           throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Performs a network request on a different thread and delivers a message to the callback. A JSON object with the results will be bound to the message.
        Parameters:
        networkId - The network to query against as identified by domain, i.e. livefyre.com.
        userId - The Id of the user whose content is to be fetched.
        userToken - The lftoken of the user whose content is to be fetched. This parameter is required by default unless the network specifies otherwise.
        statuses - CSV of comment states to return. Optional.
        offset - Number of results to skip, defaults to 0. 25 items are returned at a time. Optional.
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException
        See Also:
        "https://github.com/Livefyre/livefyre-docs/wiki/User-Content-API"

      • generateUserContentEndpoint

        public static java.lang.String generateUserContentEndpoint(java.lang.String networkId,
                                           java.lang.String userId,
                                           java.lang.String userToken,
                                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> statuses,
                                           java.lang.Integer offset)
                                                    throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Parameters:
        networkId - The network to query against as identified by domain, i.e. livefyre.com.
        userId - The Id of the user whose content is to be fetched.
        userToken - The lftoken of the user whose content is to be fetched. This parameter is required by default unless the network specifies otherwise.
        statuses - CSV of comment states to return. Optional.
        offset - Number of results to skip, defaults to 0. 25 items are returned at a time. Optional.
        Returns:
        User Content endpoint with the specified parameters.
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException
